sub_title: Professor of Chinese Language & Literature at Leiden University
summary:
Research specialization in Chinese poetry. Teaching and thesis supervision in Chinese literature and culture and Mandarin language acquisition.

Publications include:

—"Walk on the Wild Side: Snapshots of the Chinese Poetry Scene" (2017, long essay, download PDF at http://u.osu.edu/mclc/online-series/walk-on-the-wild-side/)
—Text, Performance, and Gender in Chinese Literature and Music: Essays in Honor of Wilt Idema (2009, first editor, with Tian Yuan Tan and Michel Hockx)
—Chinese Poetry in Times of Mind, Mayhem and Money (2008, authored monograph)
—Language Shattered: Contemporary Chinese Poetry and Duoduo (1996, authored monograh)
—numerous articles in English, Dutch and Chinese, in book publications and in scholarly and literary journals including Modern Chinese Literature, Modern Chinese Literature & Culture, MCLC Resource Center, The Journal of Modern Literature in Chinese, Tamkang Review, Studies on Asia, minima sinica, Renditions, Shi tansuo, Dangdai zuojia pinglun, Xinshi pinglun, Jintian and leading Dutch periodicals and newspapers (de revisor, Raster, Armada, De Gids, Het trage vuur, Volkskrant, NRC, Trouw, etc)
—translations of Chinese literature into Dutch and English, and of Dutch literature into Chinese: several books, numerous journal publications

Administration and service include:

2009-...	Academic Director, Leiden University Institute for Area Studies
2009-...	Board member, International Institute for Asian Studies (IIAS)
2004-2006	Board member, Humanities Council, Netherlands Organization for Scientific Research (NWO)
1999-...	secretary, Hulsewé-Wazniewski Foundation for the Advancement of Teaching and Research at Leiden University in the Archaeology, Art and Material Culture of China 
1999-...	administrative duties on program, institute school and faculty levels at Leiden University, including departmental headship, curriculum development and program review
1987-...	advisor to Poetry International (Rotterdam)
